title: JSON schema for WordPress block theme global settings and styles

ref.description: A reference to another property value. e.g. `styles.color.text`

appearanceTools.description:
Setting that enables the following UI tools:

- background: backgroundImage
- border: color, radius, style, width
- color: link
- dimensions: aspectRatio, minHeight
- position: sticky
- spacing: blockGap, margin, padding
- typography: lineHeight

useRootPaddingAwareAlignments.description:
_**Note:** Since WordPress 6.1._

Enables root padding (the values from `styles.spacing.padding`) to be applied to the contents of full-width blocks instead of the root block.

Please note that when using this setting, `styles.spacing.padding` should always be set as an object with `top`, `right`, `bottom`, `left` values declared separately.

color.description: Allow users to set custom border colors.

radius.description: Allow users to set custom border radius.

style.description: Allow users to set custom border styles.

width.description: Allow users to set custom border widths.

defaultPresets.description: Allow users to choose shadows from the default shadow presets.

presets.description:
Shadow presets for the shadow picker.
Generates a single custom property (`--wp--preset--shadow--{slug}`) per preset value.

name.description: Name of the shadow preset, translatable.

slug.description: Kebab-case unique identifier for the shadow preset.

background.description: Allow users to set background colors.

custom.description: Allow users to select custom colors.

customDuotone.description: Allow users to create custom duotone filters.

customGradient.description: Allow users to create custom gradients.

defaultDuotone.description: Allow users to choose filters from the default duotone filter presets.

defaultGradients.description: Allow users to choose colors from the default gradients.

defaultPalette.description: Allow users to choose colors from the default palette.

duotone.description:
Duotone presets for the duotone picker.
Doesn't generate classes or properties.

name.description: Name of the duotone preset, translatable.

slug.description: Kebab-case unique identifier for the duotone preset.

colors.description: List of colors from dark to light.

gradients.description:
Gradient presets for the gradient picker.
Generates a single class (`.has-{slug}-background`) and custom property (`--wp--preset--gradient--{slug}`) per preset value.

name.description: Name of the gradient preset, translatable.

slug.description: Kebab-case unique identifier for the gradient preset.

link.description: Allow users to set link colors in a block.

palette.description:
Color palette presets for the color picker.
Generates three classes (`.has-{slug}-color`, `.has-{slug}-background-color`, and `.has-{slug}-border-color`) and a single custom property (`--wp--preset--color--{slug}`) per preset value.

name.description: Name of the color preset, translatable.

slug.description: Kebab-case unique identifier for the color preset.

text.description: Allow users to set text colors in a block.

heading.description: Allow users to set heading colors in a block.

button.description: Allow users to set button colors in a block.

backgroundImage.description: Allow users to set a background image.

aspectRatio.description: Allow users to set an aspect ratio.

minHeight.description: Allow users to set custom minimum height.

contentSize.description: Sets the max-width of the content.

wideSize.description: Sets the max-width of wide (`.alignwide`) content. Also used as the maximum viewport when calculating fluid font sizes

allowCustomContentAndWideSize.description: Enable or disable the custom content and wide size controls.

enabled.description: Defines whether the lightbox is enabled or not.

allowEditing.description: Defines whether to show the Lightbox UI in the block editor. If set to `false`, the user won't be able to change the lightbox settings in the block editor.

sticky.description: Allow users to set sticky position.

blockGap.description:
Enables `--wp--style--block-gap` to be generated from styles.spacing.blockGap.
A value of `null` instead of `false` further disables layout styles from being generated.

margin.description: Allow users to set a custom margin.

padding.description: Allow users to set a custom padding.

units.description: List of units the user can use for spacing values.

customSpacingSize.description: Allow users to set custom space sizes.

spacingSizes.description:
Space size presets for the space size selector.
Generates a custom property (`--wp--preset--spacing--{slug}`) per preset value.

name.description: Name of the space size preset, translatable.

slug.description: Unique identifier for the space size preset. For best cross theme compatibility these should be in the form '10','20','30','40','50','60', etc. with '50' representing the 'Medium' size step.

spacingScale.description:
Settings to auto-generate space size presets for the space size selector.
Generates a custom property (--wp--preset--spacing--{slug}`) per preset value.

operator.description: With + or * depending on whether scale is generated by increment or multiplier.

increment.description: The amount to increment each step by.

steps.description: Number of steps to generate in scale.

mediumStep.description: The value to medium setting in the scale.

unit.description: Unit that the scale uses, eg. rem, em, px.

customFontSize.description: Allow users to set custom font sizes.

fontStyle.description: Allow users to set custom font styles.

fontWeight.description: Allow users to set custom font weights.

fluid.description: Enables fluid typography and allows users to set global fluid typography parameters.

minFontSize.description: Allow users to set a global minimum font size boundary in px, rem or em. Custom font sizes below this value will not be clamped, and all calculated minimum font sizes will be, at a minimum, this value.

maxViewportWidth.description: Allow users to set custom a max viewport width in px, rem or em, used to set the maximum size boundary of a fluid font size.

minViewportWidth.description: Allow users to set a custom min viewport width in px, rem or em, used to set the minimum size boundary of a fluid font size.

letterSpacing.description: Allow users to set custom letter spacing.

lineHeight.description: Allow users to set custom line height.

textColumns.description: Allow users to set the number of text columns.

textDecoration.description: Allow users to set custom text decorations.

writingMode.description: Allow users to set the writing mode.

textTransform.description: Allow users to set custom text transforms.

fontSizes.description:
Font size presets for the font size selector.
Generates a single class (`.has-{slug}-color`) and custom property (`--wp--preset--font-size--{slug}`) per preset value.

name.description: Name of the font size preset, translatable.

slug.description: Kebab-case unique identifier for the font size preset.

fluid.description: Specifies the minimum and maximum font size value of a fluid font size. Set to `false` to bypass fluid calculations and use the static `size` value.

min.description: A min font size for fluid font size calculations in px, rem or em.

max.description: A max font size for fluid font size calculations in px, rem or em.

fontFamilies.description:
Font family presets for the font family selector.
Generates a single custom property (`--wp--preset--font-family--{slug}`) per preset value.

name.description: Name of the font family preset, translatable.

slug.description: Kebab-case unique identifier for the font family preset.

fontWeight.description: List of available font weights, separated by a space.

src.description: Paths or URLs to the font files.

custom.description: Generate custom CSS custom properties of the form `--wp--custom--{key}--{nested-key}: {value};`. `camelCased` keys are transformed to `kebab-case` as to follow the CSS property naming schema. Keys at different depth levels are separated by `--`, so keys should not include `--` in the name.

blockGap.description: Sets the `--wp--style--block-gap` CSS custom property when settings.spacing.blockGap is true.

css.description: Sets custom CSS to apply styling not covered by other theme.json properties.

title.description: Title of the global styles variation. If not defined, the file name will be used.

description.description: Description of the global styles variation.

settings.description:
Settings for the block editor and individual blocks. These include things like:
- Which customization options should be available to the user. 
- The default colors, font sizes... available to the user. 
- CSS custom properties and class names used in styles.
- And the default layout of the editor (widths and available alignments).

blocks.description: Settings defined on a per-block basis.

styles.description: Organized way to set CSS properties. Styles in the top-level will be added in the `body` selector.

elements.description: Styles defined on a per-element basis using the element's selector.

blocks.description: Styles defined on a per-block basis using the block's selector.

customTemplates.description: Additional metadata for custom templates defined in the templates folder.

name.description: Filename, without extension, of the template in the templates folder.

postTypes.description: List of post types that can use this custom template.

templateParts.description: Additional metadata for template parts defined in the parts folder.

name.description: Filename, without extension, of the template in the parts folder.

area.description: The area the template part is used for. Block variations for `header` and `footer` values exist and will be used when the area is set to one of those.

patterns.description: An array of pattern slugs to be registered from the Pattern Directory.
